description:
The HIGHEST rated Excel Level 2 course on Udemy!!! 

New "Student Questions Answered" added July 2016

What other students are saying:

Amazing - I have learned so much from taking this course! I love the way the formulas are broken down into their component parts, and then built up piece by piece to get amazing results…. by far the easiest way to master the power of Excel…I love the course, and I love the teaching style…get this course! - Beatrice

Fantastic Course - I just loved this course! I did Level 1 a while ago and couldn't wait for Level 2. Alan breaks everything down in to simple steps, so you can actually follow it and understand how it all fits together…Thank you Alan for another fantastic course! - Nickie

  • Average minutes viewed almost triple that of other Microsoft courses!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is the course for those who want to master the full power of Excel.

If you have already completed Level 1, or already have a basic understanding of Excel, this is the course to help you use Excel like the pros!

You will learn powerful and little known techniques to enable you to build powerful spreadsheet solutions to take your skills to the next level.

Together we will cover multiple projects step-by-step in depth to ensure that you thoroughly understand how the various functions and formulas work. And how to combine multiple functions in a simple way to create powerful solutions that most users believe can't be done in Excel.

This isn't just a course with a bunch of formulas, it's hands on guide through real life projects. You will learn how to build complex solutions using the very same methods I use. 

Become the Excel guru I know you can be, with the help of this course!
title: Excel Essentials: Level 2 - Intermediate/Advanced
